biography: TV director in both single-camera and multi-camera productions. Experience with complex editing techniques. Amoung others, worked with famous stand-up comedians Toon Hermans, Paul van Vliet, Youp van 't Hek and Jochem Myjer. In addition, made a number of cultural and topical (international) documentaries such as "Pigrimages in Europe", "St. Jacobs Heaven" and "In the Light of Lucca".  Specialisms: Has a broad range of professional interests, although there is an increasing emphasis in working on programmes of an informative and cultural nature.
name: Joep Krijnen
